sentences.en: After menopause, when estrogen levels plummet, some women become forgetful.
sentences.cn: 绝经期后, 当雌激素水平骤然下降, 一些女性开始变得健忘.

sentences.en: And our economy would plummet into the abyss of national economic ruin.
sentences.cn: 而我们的经济就会陷入全面崩溃的深渊.

sentences.en: Auto makers, including Toyota, are setting aside millions of dollars in leased - vehicle losses as - car prices plummet.
sentences.cn: 此外, 由于二手车价格大幅下挫,丰田等车商不得不留出数百万美元,作为租车业务的损失准备金.

sentences.en: If foreigners were to stop accumulating new dollars, the dollar's value would plummet.
sentences.cn: 如果外国人停止积累新美元, 美元的价值将会一落千丈.

sentences.en: Just watch your electricity bills plummet!
sentences.cn: 您的电费帐单将直线下降!

sentences.en: Mengniu and Yili have seen their shares plummet since the incident broke.
sentences.cn: 自事件发生以来,蒙牛和伊利的股票大幅下跌.

sentences.en: Pieces of rock plummet down the mountainside to the ground below.
sentences.cn: 岩石一块块顺著山的陡坡滚落到地面.

sentences.en: Share price plummet or plunge on the news of the devaluation.
sentences.cn: 一有贬值的消息,股票价格就暴跌了.

sentences.en: Stocks that plummet to half their value aren't losers, they're'non - performers '.
sentences.cn: 股票价格跌了一半的人不是失败者, 而是 “ 表现不佳”.

sentences.en: That could be alarming if markets dry up and asset values plummet.
sentences.cn: 如果市场枯竭,资产价值沉底,后果令人难以想象.

sentences.en: The markets began to plummet even before the 15 - minute voting period expired on the House floor.
sentences.cn: 在众议院的投票期限截止前15分钟市场就开始走低.

sentences.en: The plane plummeted towards the Earth.
The prices of the shares may ~ or plummet within one day.
sentences.cn: 股票价格有可能在一天之内飞速上升或骤然下跌.

sentences.en: This has caused confidence to plummet in recent months after a decade - long boom in commercial property.
sentences.cn: 商业地产行业在经历了长达十年的繁荣时期后,目前的状况导致近几个月市场信心大跌.

sentences.en: We'd revise to rewire the building, re plummet re - plumb it.
sentences.cn: 我们必须给大楼重换电线, 重新使它立直.

sentences.en: What caused the balloon to plummet?
sentences.cn: 是什么原因致使气球骤然跌落下来了 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 探究；垂直悬挂；用铅锤测量；灌铅以增重（plumb的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 垂直落下；（价格、水平等）骤然下跌
trans.tran_en: to suddenly and quickly decrease in value or amount
